summary.span: 代表 n 個值的元組，其中 n 大於或等於 8。

span.span: Represents an *n*-value tuple, where *n* is 8 or greater.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值元組是具有特定的數字和值序列的資料結構。A value tuple is a data structure that has a specific number and sequence of values. 結構代表具有八個或多個元素的值元組。The structure represents a value tuple that has eight or more elements. 值元組類型不同的 tuple 型別 (例如)，如下所示：The value tuple types differ from the tuple types (such as ) as follows: - 它們是結構 （實值類型），而不是類別 （參考型別）。They are structures (value types) rather than classes (reference types). - 這類成員和是欄位，而不是屬性。Members such as and are fields rather than properties. - 其欄位是可變動而非唯讀狀態。Their fields are mutable rather than read-only. 值元組類型提供支援的執行階段實作[tuple C# ](~/docs/csharp/tuples.md)中的結構元組和F#。The value tuple types provide the runtime implementation that supports [tuples in C#](~/docs/csharp/tuples.md) and struct tuples in F#. 除了建立執行個體所使用的語言語法，您可以呼叫factory 方法。In addition to creating a instance by using language syntax, you can call the factory method. ### 序列化和值的 tupleSerialization and value tuples 類型不是可序列化的.NET Core 1.x 或在.NET Framework 4.7 和舊版本。The type is not serializable in .NET Core 1.x or in the .NET Framework 4.7 and earlier versions. 此外，.NET Standard，包括.NET Standard 2.0，不會要求您提供的序列化執行個體; 是否是可序列化的執行個體取決於個別的.NET Standard 實作。In addition, .NET Standard, including .NET Standard 2.0, does not mandate serialization of instances; whether or not a instance is serializable depends on the individual .NET Standard implementation. 若要判斷是否型別是可序列化特定的.NET 實作上，會取得物件，表示類型及擷取的值及其屬性。To determine whether a type is serializable on a particular .NET implementation, get a object that represents the type and retrieve the value of its property. 如需可序列化的型別在.NET Core 和.NET Framework 中的清單，請參閱 < [ 二進位序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/binary-serialization.md)。For a list of serializable types in .NET Core and the .NET Framework, see [Binary Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/binary-serialization.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks `obj`引數會被視為等於目前的執行個體，在下列情況下：The `obj` argument is considered to be equal to the current instance under the following conditions: - 它是實值型別。It is a value type. - 其元件會與目前執行個體相同的類型。Its components are of the same types as those of the current instance. - 其元件會等於目前的執行個體。Its components are equal to those of the current instance. 每個元件的預設相等比較子來判斷相等。Equality is determined by the default equality comparer for each component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 欄位會傳回巢狀的值元組，但允許存取的第八個*n*個元素的元組。The field returns a nested value tuple that allows access to the eighth though *n*th elements of the tuple. 根據 tuple 中的項目總數，透過第十四個元件的第八個值可以擷取從巢狀的值的 tuple`Item1`透過`Item7`屬性。Depending on the total number of elements in the tuple, the values of the eighth through fourteenth components can be retrieved from the nested value tuple's `Item1` through `Item7` properties. 然後您可以使用巢狀的屬性擷取下一個層級的巢狀值元組的物件。You can then use the property of a nested object to retrieve the value tuple at the next level of nesting.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個成員是明確介面實作。This member is an explicit interface implementation. 僅能使用的時機執行個體轉換成介面。It can only be used when the instance is cast to an interface. 這個方法可讓您定義的自訂的比較物件。This method lets you define customized comparisons of objects. 例如，您可以使用這個方法，以順序物件為基礎的特定元件的值。For example, you can use this method to order objects based on the value of a specific component. 雖然可以直接呼叫這個方法，它會最常呼叫集合排序方法，包括參數來排序集合的成員。Although this method can be called directly, it is most commonly called by collection-sorting methods that include parameters to order the members of a collection. 比方說，它由呼叫方法和方法具現化所使用的物件建構函式。For example, it is called by the method and the method of a object that is instantiated by using the constructor. > [!CAUTION] > 方法是用於排序作業。The method is intended for use in sorting operations. 此外，它不應該使用時比較的主要目的是要判斷兩個物件是否相等。It should not be used when the primary purpose of a comparison is to determine whether two objects are equal. 若要判斷兩個物件是否相等，請呼叫方法。To determine whether two objects are equal, call the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個成員是明確介面實作。This member is an explicit interface implementation. 僅能使用的時機執行個體轉換成介面。It can only be used when the instance is cast to an interface. 實作稱為 「 只有當`other`不是`null`，如果它可以是 已成功轉換成物件具有相同的相同的類型 （包括巢狀的 tuple 物件） 的元件總數目前的執行個體。The implementation is called only if `other` is not `null`, and if it can be successfully cast to a object that has the same total number of components (including those in nested tuple objects) of the same types as the current instance. 方法的第一個階段的值要比較的物件實作。The method first passes the values of the objects to be compared to the implementation. 如果這個方法呼叫傳回`true`，方法是呼叫一次，並傳遞兩個物件。If this method call returns `true`, the method is called again and passed the values of the two objects. 這會繼續執行直到方法呼叫傳回`false`時，它會比較值或兩個一組特定值會傳遞至方法。This continues until the method call returns `false` when it compares a specific pair of values, or the two values are passed to the method.

returns.span: 這個 執行個體的字串表示。

span.span: The string representation of this instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法所傳回的字串形式 (*Item1*， *Item2*， *Item3*， *Item4*， *Item5*， *Item6*， *Item7*， *Item8*...)，其中*Item1*， *Item2*， *Item3*， *Item4*， *Item5*， *Item6*，以及*Item7*代表值， ， ， ， ， ，和欄位。The string returned by this method takes the form (*Item1*, *Item2*, *Item3*, *Item4*, *Item5*, *Item6*, *Item7*, *Item8*…), where *Item1*, *Item2*, *Item3*, *Item4*, *Item5*, *Item6*, and *Item7* represent the values of the , , , , , , and fields. *Item8*代表的值執行個體的`Next.Item1`欄位。*Item8* represents the value of the instance's `Next.Item1` field. 任何額外的巢狀項目值會遵循*Item8*。The value of any additional nested elements follows *Item8*. 如果任何一個欄位的值是`null`，表示為。If any of the field values is `null`, it is represented as .
